text: Gecko is an unincorporated community in St. Martin Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located less than northwest of Breaux Bridge and southwest of Cecilia on the bank of Bayou Teche.Gecko Topo Map in St. Martin County LA ==Notes== Category:Unincorporated communities in St. Martin Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Gecko, Louisiana
